nodes.name: Charities
addCharity
readCharity
donateToCharity

nodes.documentation:
@dev This function allows users to request a refund for a specific charity. There are check to see if there are refunds available.
@param charityID ID of the charity to read
nodes.name: getRefund

nodes.documentation:
@dev This function allows to get the nr of donations for a given charityID for the msg sender
@param charityID ID of the charity
nodes.name: getDonationNumberForDonator
consumeDonation

nodes.documentation:
@dev Represents a closing of a charity. Only the contract owner can call this function.
@param charityID ID of the charity
nodes.name: closeCharity

devdoc.details: using SafeMath ( uint256) for under/overflow protection

addCharity(string,address,uint256,uint25.details: Adds a new charity to the contract.

params._closingBlock: closing block for the donation (logic not implemented yet)
params._patron: a patron for the charity (logic not implemented yet)
params._price: price in wei for each charity item
params._serviceProvider: the service provider which serves the charity item (and gets paid for served items)
params._totalDonations: number of available donations for this charity

closeCharity(uint256).details: Represents a closing of a charity. Only the contract owner can call this function.

consumeDonation(uint256,uint256).details: Represents a confirmation of a consumation. Only the contract owner can call this function.

donateToCharity(uint256,uint256).details: This function allows users to donate to a specific charity with given id.

params.charityID: ID of the charity to read
params.nrOfDonations: how many of the donation should be buyed

getDonationNumberForDonator(uint256).details: This function allows to get the nr of donations for a given charityID for the msg sender

getRefund(uint256).details: This function allows users to request a refund for a specific charity. There are check to see if there are refunds available.

params.charityID: ID of the charity to read

readCharity(uint256).details: Returns charity members values with the given charityID.

params.charityID: ID of the charity to read

readCharity(uint256).return: description description of the charitytotalDonations number of available donations for this charitysoldDonations number of sold donations for this charityconsumedDonations number of consumed donations for this charityserviceProvider he service provider which serves the charity item (and gets paid for served items)closingBlock  closing block for the donation (logic not implemented yet)isOpen status variable

devdoc.title: The Charities contract keeps track of the charities. It is using SafeMath library to mitigate over and underflow problems. Circuit breaker stops execution of donations in emergency.
